scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a figure wearing a hat and a cloak, holding a staff in their left hand and resting their right arm on a pouch. The figure stands in a dotted landscape, possibly representing a field or garden, with a small animal, likely a dog, at their feet. Above the figure, an arched architectural element frames the scene, decorated with scrolling motifs. The overall impression is of a pastoral or devotional scene, possibly representing a saint or a figure associated with nature or pilgrimage.
